todos.content: Implement centralized error management with graceful degradation, user-friendly messages, exponential backoff retries, and result caching
Integrate Sentry for error tracking, Web Vitals for performance metrics, and APM monitoring
Set up Jest, React Testing Library, Cypress, MSW for comprehensive testing suite on Diagnostics page
Develop modern UI/UX with design system, micro-interactions, dark theme, and PWA capabilities
Implement bundle analysis, code splitting, lazy loading, and runtime optimizations for 40-60% faster load times
Create mobile-first responsive design with touch gestures, PWA features, and mobile-specific components
Build RESTful external API with authentication, documentation, webhooks, and SDK libraries
Implement Winston logging, PM2 monitoring, Grafana dashboards, and alerting system on Diagnostics page
